task.title: Configuring CBAM not to have FAILED_TEMP error

context.p: When using CBAM 19.5 SP1 or higher, a new temporary state FAILED_TEMP appears if any operation fails. This can be avoided by using the following procedure.

step.cmd: Follow the steps given in CBAM User Guide, in section Nokia VNFM API minor versions.
Follow the steps given in CBAM Administrator Guide, in section Changing CBAM configuration parameters.
